about_the_game:
A kind hand may lead to the end....

Gamble your way out of Eclipse Casino fighting 30+ bosses, learning 50+ skills, and meeting or recruiting over 100 different characters! A challenging roguelike turn-based rpg where you must escape the Shady Casino Owner by fighting and gambling your way out!

Countless Unique Bosses

Endless Skill Combos

With over 50 skills to learn and forget, not only is each playthrough different, but each fight as well! Almost all skills have a usage amount to them, adding an additional level to skill management. Gain skills from playing the casino games as well as through other means.

Tables, Machines, & More!

Core Features

  • Gambling (Blackjack, Slot Machines, Roulette, etc)

  • Skills (Earn skills by gambling, winning fights, equipping certain gear pieces, and other unique ways)

  • Bosses (Beat 14 changing bosses to face the Casino Owner and escape the casino! (hopefully))

  • Gear & Items (Purchase, find, and trade for hats, necklaces, 4-leaf clovers, passports, and more throughout shops and other not so clean ways)

  • Drinks (Choose from a diverse menu of drinks to consume and buff (usually) yourself in fights and gambling. Be careful, each drink consumed will raise your drunkness!

  • Exploration (Visit the VIP Room, Bathrooms, Shops, Bars, Gambling Rooms, Closets, Kitchens and more)

  • Recruit (Battle together with members from 4 factions, Gangsters, Police Officers, Show Girls, & the Casino Workers themselves! All having unique play-styles when added to your party)

  • 6 Playable Characters (unlock, buy, or find characters to start a new run with, all having their own stories, effects, and more)

              

*ALL REFERENCES TO GAMBLING AND MONEY IS PURELY FICTIONAL, THERE IS NO REAL WORLD TRANSACTIONS IN THIS GAME.
